data.title: 19 Rarely-Seen Couples Who Made Us Swoon at the 2024 Met Gala
data.meta_description: Celebrity Couples at the 2024 Met Gala: Elsa Pataky and Chris Hemsworth, Matt and Luciana Damon, and more couples.
data.text:
Back in 2014, Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds chose the Met Gala to make their long-awaited red carpet debut together. And while the two had already been together for over two years at that point, the couple’s debut marked an important moment for them, finally allowing the world to see how in love they are with each other.

Luckily for Met Gala fans, Lively and Reynolds aren’t the only Hollywood couple who’ve shared some memorable moments on the Met Gala steps. After all, who could forget Pete Davidson right by Kim Kardashian’s side when she wore the Marilyn Monroe dress in 2022? Or when Keith Urban helped wife Nicole Kidman with her train at the 2022 Met Gala?

In honor of those sweet moments, take a look at all the celebrity couples who attended the 2024 Met Gala. Plus, see some red carpet debuts too!

Elsa Pataky & Chris Hemsworth

One of tonight’s co-chairs Chris Hemsworth was joined by his wife, Elsa Pataky, on the carpet. Hemsworth wore this cream-colored three-piece suit and white button-down while Pataky matched in this gold sheer dress.

Dwyane Wade & Gabrielle Union

Gabrielle Union rocked this mermaid core scalloped dress while her husband Dwyane Wade looked dapper in this lavender suit.

Kieran Culkin & Jazz Charton

Kieran Culkin and Jazz Charton shared some sweet PDA on the carpet. Culkin wore this multi-colored printed suit while Charton wore this bright yellow floral number.

Kelsea Ballerini & Chase Stokes

Chase Stokes couldn’t get his eyes off girlfriend Kelsea Ballerini on the carpet. Ballerini wore this sheer dress with orange and pink flowers while Stokes showed some skirt in this sequined black suit with no shirt underneath.

Dove Cameron & Damiano David

Dove Cameron and Damiano David couldn’t keep their hands off each other on the carpet. Cameron and David wowed in lace Diesel looks.

Eboni Nichols & Queen Latifah

Eboni Nichols and Queen Latifah looked so happy together as they made their Met Gala debut side-by-side.

Kris Jenner & Corey Gamble

Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble also matched in these eggshell-colored looks.

Rita Ora & Taika Waititi

Rita Ora and Taika Waititi walked hand in hand on the Met steps as she wowed in this skin-baring Marni dress and Waititi looked cool as ever in this all-brown-leather look.

Hannah Bagshawe & Eddie Redmayne

Hannah Bagshawe and Eddie Redmayne embraced the theme, and matching looks, in these black and white tulle dresses by Steve O Smith.

Jeremy Strong & Emma Wall

Jeremy Strong perfectly matched his wife Emma Wall in cream-colored floral looks.

Matt & Luciana Damon

Matt and Luciana Damon opted for classic looks on the carpet as the actor rocked this classic black tux and Luciana wore this strapless white dress.

James Corden & Julia Carey

James Corden and Julia Carey looked so happy together on the carpet. Corden wore a classic black tux while Carey wore this flower-embrioidered pink dress.

Christian Cowan & Sam Smith

Christian Cowan and Sam Smith matched in these black and cream suits with identical golden roses on the lapel. What a dapper couple!

Dee & Tommy Hilfiger

Dee Hilfiger looked absolutely breathtaking on the carpet in this floral cream dress and matching cape alongside her husband, Tommy Hilfiger.

Seth Meyers & Alexi Ashe

Seth Meyers and Alexi Ashe matched in black and white looks on the carpet. Meyers wore a classic tux while Ashe wore this floral flowy dress.

Baz Luhrmann & Catherine Martin

Baz Luhrmann and Catherine Martin matched in green looks on the carpet with silver embellishments.

Leonardo Del Vecchio & Jessica Serfaty Michel

Actress Jessica Serfaty and Italian billionaire Leonardo Maria Del Vecchio matched as they both wore sunglasses while posing on the carpet. The Days of Our Lives star wore this multi-colored floral cape while Del Vecchio wore this crisp maroon suit.

Adrien Brody & Georgina Chapman

Adrien Brody and Georgina Chapman matched in one interesting way on the carpet: their hair! Brody debuted his new platinum hair on the carpet while Chapman wowed in this flowy black and silver dress.
